alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 12:30PM MST until January 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM TO IMPACT THE PACIFIC NORTHWEST THROUGH WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches in the valleys, up to 7 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph in higher terrain Tuesday. * WHERE...Soldiers Meadow Road, Nezperce, Craigmont, Winchester, and Kamiah. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact travel Tuesday. Strong winds could cause localized damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
